update c_mastery
SUMMONER_ID = #{summonerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHAMPION_ID = #{championId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHEST_GRANTED = #{chestGranted,jdbcType=BIT},
CHAMPION_LEVEL = #{championLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

LAST_PLAY_TIME = #{lastPlayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
